name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Aipaku Dance Hall'.

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aipaku Dance Hall

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aipaku Dance Hall

subtitles.original: 僕らが生まれて初めて知る音は
subtitles.english: The first sound we know when we are born

subtitles.original: 心臓の鼓動だ
subtitles.english: is the sound of our heartbeat.

subtitles.original: どたどたどたどたどたてんてたどた
subtitles.english: Thump-thump-thump-thump...

subtitles.original: それはリズムと知った
subtitles.english: We knew that was rhythm.

subtitles.original: 古も今時も
subtitles.english: In the past and in the present,

subtitles.original: サイビートが僕たちを紡いで繋いでんだろう
subtitles.english: Cybeat must be spinning and connecting us together.

subtitles.original: タタタタタハイ
subtitles.english: Ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-Hi!

subtitles.original: 愛配愛配でオレオレ　トロケチャウネ
subtitles.english: With Aipai Aipai, Ole Ole, melting away...

subtitles.original: 甘ズッパイデモンQアイ
subtitles.english: Sweet and sour...

subtitles.original: 乾杯完全にホレホレ
subtitles.english: Cheers, completely infatuated...

subtitles.original: ヨンミラミミミタイアイホドリアクマネッカパパラパッパ
subtitles.english: Dancing infatuated...

subtitles.original: ラガララララガラララ
subtitles.english: La-ga-la-la-la...

subtitles.original: まるでダンスホールを踊ってるみたい
subtitles.english: It's like we're dancing in a dance hall,

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わったような気分でして
subtitles.english: feeling like we've been reborn.

subtitles.original: 乾杯な今日はボレロ
subtitles.english: A toast, today is a bolero.

subtitles.original: おすまし顔に反してバカなんて笑って
subtitles.english: Laughing about how silly it is, despite the serious look.

subtitles.original: テレテッテッテッテッテッテン
subtitles.english: Te-re-te-te...

subtitles.original: 寂しいよな　終わりを近づけるとさ
subtitles.english: It's lonely when the end draws near.

subtitles.original: 終わらないパイのように続けたい
subtitles.english: I want it to continue like the endless Pi.

subtitles.original: 計算なんてできないが
subtitles.english: I can't do the math,

subtitles.original: おー
subtitles.english: Oh...

subtitles.original: 愛配愛配ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aipai Aipai Dance Hall,

subtitles.original: 今日はボレロ　トロケチャウネ　甘ズッパイデモンQアイ
subtitles.english: today's a bolero... melting away... sweet and sour...

subtitles.original: また食べに来てね
subtitles.english: Please come to eat again.

subtitles.original: あなたならいつでもいいよ
subtitles.english: Anytime is fine for you.

subtitles.original: おかわり欲しいでしょ
subtitles.english: You want seconds, don't you?

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aipaku Dance Hall

subtitles.original: おかわりならもし
subtitles.english: If you want seconds...

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aipaku Dance Hall

subtitles.original: どうぞ
subtitles.english: Please.

subtitles.original: さよならプリンセス　夢に待っている
subtitles.english: Goodbye, Princess, waiting in a dream.

subtitles.original: 眠り沈むその姿は華やかな
subtitles.english: Your form sinking into sleep is brilliant.

subtitles.original: 魅惑のハッピーエンド　私とさよならだ
subtitles.english: A captivating happy ending, it's goodbye to me.

subtitles.original: さよならプリンセス
subtitles.english: Sayonara Princess

subtitles.original: 鏡の中一人縛られて
subtitles.english: Tied up alone in the mirror,

subtitles.original: 頭の中に駆け回る毎日です
subtitles.english: it's a daily cycle running through my head.

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　だって私変わらないし
subtitles.english: Forever and ever, because I don't change.

subtitles.original: 夢もないし　口もないし
subtitles.english: I have no dreams, no mouth,

subtitles.original: つまらないし　可愛くもないし
subtitles.english: it's boring, and I'm not even cute.

subtitles.original: 分からないし　仕方ないし
subtitles.english: I don't understand, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: 不意に気づいたらまるで
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it's like...

subtitles.original: 指を解く火花になっていたんだ
subtitles.english: it had become a spark that unbinds the fingers.

subtitles.original: 壊れた大人の愛嬌なんだ
subtitles.english: It's the charm of a broken adult.

subtitles.original: 期待を懸けた私のことなんて気にしないでね
subtitles.english: Please don't worry about me, whom you put your expectations on.

subtitles.original: さよならプリンセス　夢に待っている
subtitles.english: Goodbye, Princess, waiting in a dream.

subtitles.original: 一人浮かぶその姿は華やかな
subtitles.english: That form floating alone is brilliant.

subtitles.original: 魅惑のハッピーエンド　私とさよならだ
subtitles.english: A captivating happy ending, it's goodbye to me.

subtitles.original: 間抜けたプリンセス　過去とバイバイだ
subtitles.english: A foolish princess, it's bye-bye to the past.

subtitles.original: この際ね何も全てを燃やしてしまおう
subtitles.english: At this point, let's just burn everything.

subtitles.original: このまま宙を泳いであの星になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could just swim through space and become that star...

subtitles.original: 私　私とさよならだ
subtitles.english: I... it's goodbye to me.

subtitles.original: 埃まみれ　妬み渦巻いた
subtitles.english: Dust-covered, swirling with jealousy,

subtitles.original: 体の中から絡まる毎日です
subtitles.english: it's a daily tangle from within my body.

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　だってあなた騙しやすいし　変わらないし
subtitles.english: Forever and ever, because you're easy to deceive, and you don't change.

subtitles.original: 脚長いし　面白いし
subtitles.english: Your legs are long, you're interesting,

subtitles.original: 顔も可愛いし
subtitles.english: and your face is cute too.

subtitles.original: さりげないし　仕方ないし
subtitles.english: You're nonchalant, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: 溢れるオーラはまるで
subtitles.english: The overflowing aura is like...

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝く王座みたいね
subtitles.english: a sparkling, shining throne, isn't it?

subtitles.original: めろめろ私も目配くないね
subtitles.english: I'm head over heels, I can't look away.

subtitles.original: 古き昨日の私のことなんて流さないでね
subtitles.english: Please don't wash away the me from the old yesterday.

subtitles.original: さよならプリンセス　愛に酔っている
subtitles.english: Goodbye, Princess, drunk on love.

subtitles.original: 一人浮かぶその姿は鮮やかな
subtitles.english: That form floating alone is vivid.

subtitles.original: 理想のハッピーエンド　私とさよならだ
subtitles.english: An ideal happy ending, it's goodbye to me.

subtitles.original: さよならプリンセス　全てバイバイだ
subtitles.english: Goodbye, Princess, it's bye-bye to everything.

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る幸せに絡まるほど
subtitles.english: As much as it's entangled in the repeating happiness...

subtitles.original: 間抜けなハッピーエンド　可愛くなれたかな
subtitles.english: A foolish happy ending, did I become cute?

subtitles.original: 私　私は既に分かっていたんだ
subtitles.english: I... I already knew.

subtitles.original: 花よさよならか
subtitles.english: Are the flowers saying goodbye?

subtitles.original: Mr. Showtime
subtitles.english: Mr. Showtime

subtitles.original: ちょっとどうもこうも言い切れない
subtitles.english: I can't quite say one way or the other.

subtitles.original: 散らかっちゃってまとまらない
subtitles.english: It's all cluttered and won't come together.

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちの世界に響くモノローグ
subtitles.english: A monologue echoing in a lonely world.

subtitles.original: あれもこれも出来やしない
subtitles.english: I can't do this or that.

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる回るメリーゴーランド
subtitles.english: A merry-go-round spinning round and round.

subtitles.original: 踊って踊っていくほどお手のものハグリ
subtitles.english: The more I dance and dance, the more I'm in my element...

subtitles.original: あっちこっちすんで踏ん張って
subtitles.english: Staying here and there and holding on.

subtitles.original: 誇り高き演目の行き止まりでも
subtitles.english: Even at the dead end of a proud performance,

subtitles.original: 諦めない　駆けるスターダム
subtitles.english: I won't give up, racing towards stardom.

subtitles.original: なら一人ぼっちじゃつまらないでしょ
subtitles.english: Then being all alone is boring, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 青砂の迷い子も全てあの星を目指せ
subtitles.english: Even the lost children in the blue sand, aim for that star.

subtitles.original: まるで掴めやしない　届きやしない願いの島まで
subtitles.english: To the island of wishes that can't be grasped, can't be reached...

subtitles.original: 明日へ
subtitles.english: Towards tomorrow.
